title: Don’t Knock Twice
body:
Don’t Knock Twice


Genres/Tags: Adventure, First-person, 3D, Horror
Company: Wales Interactive
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 947 MB
Repack Size: 667 MB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]

  • FreeTorrents

  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Dont.Knock.Twice-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-dont.knock.twice.iso (993,198,080 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 947 to 667 MB)
  • Installation takes 15-50 seconds (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 2 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings, in Audio tab
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Don’t Knock Twice is a first-person VR horror game based on a psychologically terrifying urban legend. To save her estranged daughter, a guilt-ridden mother must uncover the frightening truth behind the urban tale of a vengeful, demonic witch.

“One knock to wake her from her bed, twice to raise her from the dead.”

Explore a grand manor house environment in VR and interact with almost every object you see. To find and save your daughter, you will explore all depths of the manor, searching for hidden clues and wield items to fight or escape the terror that surrounds you.

The game is being developed alongside the horror film, Don’t Knock Twice, starring Katee Sackhoff (Battlestar Galactica) and directed by Caradog James (The Machine).
